# External Dependencies

- [Catch2](https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2): A modern, C++-native, header-only, test framework for unit-tests
- [dlib](https://github.com/davisking/dlib): A toolkit for making real world machine learning and data analysis applications in C++
- [TinySpline](https://github.com/msteinbeck/tinyspline): A small, yet powerful library for interpolating, transforming, and querying arbitrary NURBS, B-Splines, and BÃ©zier curves
